title: Turmoil Leads Al Jazeera America To Remove Head Of Network
teaser: Ehab Al Shihabi has lost his job as CEO of the news network, following the resignations of three high-ranking executives in the last week.
contentencoded:
Ehab Al Shihabi has lost his job as chief executive of the news organization Al Jazeera America, following the resignations of three high-ranking executives in the last week. NPR Media Correspondent David Folkenflik speaks with Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson about the shake-up at the network which was started two years ago.
